channel.title: Follow
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 server source, this may not be possible but i'd really like all help available on this topic. I've recently found a piece of coding which allows npcs to follow you, i would like this to work for players as well. I would like to make a right-click option for follow. I know how to get to the right-click menu and i also have the code for an npc to follow you:
All help is appreciated.
Thanx! :)
[CODE] server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(3504, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
[/code]

item.title: Follow
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Sorry Lescape lol,

Err it may just be my brain capacity But i don’t exactly understand that comment

Sorry for the inconvenience.

All help is appreciated

Thanx!

Read full topic

item.title: Follow
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

check the walking packets and make a walkTo void…then add the following case with walkTo to a position of the followed, example: absX -1; absY +1; etc

youll probably have to make the - and + depending on player face

Read full topic

item.title: Follow
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hmmm thanx for all your help guys,

Further help is needed and also very much appreciated.

Thanx!

Read full topic

item.title: Follow
item.dc:creator: @Hcspure Hcspure
item.description:
@Hcspure wrote:

Not alot of servers have working Follow [ NONE THAT I KNOW OF ] iv’e tried getting it working once before but i had a time follow error

EG i could follow another player for like 5 seconds, or sometimes 10 maybe 50 but never for ever, it became annoying, when your following someone and it randomly drops off.

So good luck

Read full topic
